name: KakashiManagementBot
description: Modular Dynamic Telegram group management bot!!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables

TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: optional: a chat where your replied saved messages are stored, to stop people deleting their old

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered sudo users

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered support users (can gban/ungban, nothing else)

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered whitelisted - they can't be banned.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

BAN_STICKER.description: Which sticker to use when banning people. Use https://telegram.dog/ShowJsonBot to get the file_id
